version_description:
v1.2.0
- Can use of multiple guild aircraft buffs
- Add new package
- Fixed a bug of Uranus' set option
- Added 100k Download Anniversary Wing Skin
- Fixed other bugs

v1.2.1
- Season Rift : Void Rift
- Skill Adjustment
- Weapon Balance Adjustment
- New Skins
- New Gears
- Fixed some bugs.

v1.2.2
- Tier Dungeon penalty and difficulty adjustment
- Some sets' damage effect will be influenced by Skill Damage Increase/Multiply effect.
- New Skin
- Fixed - Item not shown from the Random Crate when you scroll.
- Fixed - Effec

v1.2.3
- April Fool's Day Event Open!
- Improving other convenience
- Fix other bugs

- Network errors fix and improve performance
- Minor bug fix

v1.2.5
- Store & Random box system integration.
- Fix bugs in the number of companions of collected relics
- Improving equipment filter function
- Add first payment event
- Add new mounts.
- 35 days attendance event added
-

v1.2.50
- Store Bug Fixed.
v1.2.5
- Store & Random box system integration.
- Fix bugs in the number of companions of collected relics
- Improving equipment filter function
- Add first payment event
- Add new mounts.
- 3

v1.2.60
- Add Upgrade-Transfer features
- Added 10xroulette spin
- UI Convenience improvement
- New time-sale event

- Raising the dungeon level
- Other bug fixes

v1.2.70
- Equip-transfer bug fixed.
- Minor bug fixed.
v1.2.60
- Add Upgrade-Transfer features

- Raising

v1.5.3

- "光之化身" 套裝配戴時寶石效果標示錯誤的問題修正

- 夥伴平衡性修正與BUG修正
- 效果 UI標示錯誤的修正
- 其他bug修正與便利性改善

v1.3.1
- Additional stages in the (Common) Dungeon
